<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in Virtual MIDI -M0 is needed anyway -odac -iadc -+rtmidi=virtual -M0 </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> ; By Mark Jamerson 2007
sr=44100 ksmps=10 nchnls=2
massign 1,1 prealloc 1,10
instr 1 ;Midi FM synth
inote cpsmidi iveloc ampmidi 10000 idur = 2 xtratim 1
kgate oscil 1,10,2 anoise noise 100*inote,.99 acps samphold anoise,kgate aosc oscili 1000,acps,1 aout = aosc
; Use controller 7 to control volume kvol ctrl7 1, 7, 0.2, 1
outs kvol * aout, kvol * aout
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> f0 3600 f1 0 1024 10 1 f2 0 16 7 1 8 0 8 f3 0 1024 10 1 .5 .6 .3 .2 .5
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
